text: Soni chilikati cha ŵandu pana ŵakutiji: “Tukulupilile mwa Allah.” Nambo naga ali apedwile masausyo ligongo lya Allah, akasagatenda masausyo ga ŵandu nti chisawu ilagasyo ya Allah, sano naga chili chiyiche chikulupusyo chakuumila kwa Ambuje ŵenu chisimu (achinakunaku) akutiji: “Chisimu uwwe twaliji namwe imo,” (nambo chitamilecho ali nkulambusya). Ana nganaŵa Allah kuti ni Jwakumanyilila nnope yaili m’mitima mwa iwumbe yosope
